summary: CONSUMER CALLED COMPLAINING ABOUT HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM ON THE  VEHICLE. ALSO STATED THAT THE POWER WINDOWS DOES NOT WORK ALSO THE POWER LOCKS ON THE VEHICLE DO NOT WORK. DEALER WAS CONTACTED AND VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE SHOP ON THREE DIFFERENT TIMES AND IT WAS FINELY FIXED BUT CONSUMER STILL THINKS THAT THE VEHICLE STILL HAS DIFFERENT ISSUES.  TS  THE BRAKES SQUEALED, AND THE VEHICLE WOULD SHUT OFF WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED HARD, AND THE VEHICLE WOULD HAVE TO BE PLACED IN PARK IN ORDER TO RESTART.  A FUSE WAS REPLACED AND HAD BLOWN AGAIN, THERE WAS A SHORT GROUND IN THE WIRE ON THE REAR PASSENGER DOOR SHORTING TO THE GROUND, RECALL 00S50/DECK LID WIRE HARNESS, AND TWO DOOR LOCK ACTUATORS WERE REPLACED.  SCC
